# 喜悦之道

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xiyue-zhidao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xiyue-zhidao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xiyue-zhidao
xiyue-zhidao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xiyue-zhidao
xiyue-zhidao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
